category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 4 (appointment of members, etc.)
contents: Article 4 (Appointment of members, etc.) ① The chairperson and members are persons who have specialized knowledge regarding the purpose and activities of the committee or have experience in the relevant field and are appointed by the chairman. The chairperson shall receive the consent of the board of directors, and the vice-chairperson shall Elected from among the committee members. Revised April 3, 2017, January 31, 2019. ② When forming a committee, the following matters must be observed. Amended 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 2. 11., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Executives pursuant to Article 30 (1) 2 through 5 and Paragraph 2 of the Articles of Incorporation A person who falls under any of the following disqualifications cannot become a committee member. 2. Deleted July 5, 2023. A member of a committee cannot concurrently serve as a member of another committee. 4. Registered athletes of member sports organizations cannot become members of the Performance Improvement Committee. Newly established on July 5, 2023. The Women's Sports Committee shall be composed of human rights experts with at least 5 years of experience working in the related field. Newly established 2023. 7. 5. ③ Deleted 2023. 7. 5. ④ Deleted 2023. 7. 5. ⑤ Efforts must be made to ensure that the ratio of specific genders among members of the committee does not exceed 70% of the number of registered members. Newly established on July 5, 2023. ⑥ Notwithstanding Article 3, Paragraph 1 and Article 6, the committee under Article 2, Paragraph 1, Item 22 shall be formed and established upon resolution by the Board of Directors within the scope consistent with the purpose and nature of its establishment. The term of office may vary. Newly established 2023. 7. 5.
